Class Database

java.lang.Object
database.Database
public class Database extends Object

Title: Database Class.

Description: This is an in-memory database built on H2. Detailed documentation of H2 can be found at https://www.h2database.com/html/main.html (Click on "PDF (2MP) for a PDF of 438 pages on the H2 main page.) This class leverages H2 and provides numerous special supporting methods.

Copyright: Lynn Robert Carter Â© 2025

      public Database()

  • Method Details

    • connectToDatabase

      public void connectToDatabase() throws SQLException

      Method: connectToDatabase

      Description: Used to establish the in-memory instance of the H2 database from secondary storage.

      Throws:
      SQLException - when the DriverManager is unable to establish a connection

    • isDatabaseEmpty

      public boolean isDatabaseEmpty()

      Method: isDatabaseEmpty

      Description: If the user database has no rows, true is returned, else false.

      Returns:
      true if the database is empty, else it returns false

    • getNumberOfUsers

      public int getNumberOfUsers()

      Method: getNumberOfUsers

      Description: Returns an integer .of the number of users currently in the user database.

      Returns:
      the number of user records in the database.

    • register

      public void register(User user) throws SQLException

      Method: register(User user)

      Description: Creates a new row in the database using the user parameter.

      Parameters:
      user - specifies a user object to be added to the database.
      Throws:
      SQLException - when there is an issue creating the SQL command or executing it.

    • populateDatabaseWithTestUsers

      public void populateDatabaseWithTestUsers(User currentUser)

      Method: populateDatabaseWithTestUsers(User currentUser)

      Description: Keeps the current user data but removes all users from database and re-populates with more users for testing.

      Parameters:
      currentUser - specifies a user object to be added to the database.

    • getUserList

      public List<String> getUserList()

      Method: List getUserList()

      Description: Generate an List of Strings, one for each user in the database, starting with "<Select User>" at the start of the list.

      Returns:
      a list of userNames found in the database.

    • getUserListAdmin

      public List<String> getUserListAdmin()

      Method: List getUserListAdmin()

      Description: Generate an List of Strings, one for each admin user in the database, starting with "<Select User>" at the start of the list.

      Returns:
      a list of userNames found in the database.

    • loginAdmin

      public boolean loginAdmin(User user)

      Method: boolean loginAdmin(User user)

      Description: Check to see that a user with the specified username, password, and role is the same as a row in the table for the username, password, and role.

      Parameters:
      user - specifies the specific user that should be logged in playing the Admin role.
      Returns:
      true if the specified user has been logged in as an Admin else false.

    • loginRole1

      public boolean loginRole1(User user)

      Method: boolean loginRole1(User user)

      Description: Check to see that a user with the specified username, password, and role is the same as a row in the table for the username, password, and role.

      Parameters:
      user - specifies the specific user that should be logged in playing the Student role.
      Returns:
      true if the specified user has been logged in as an Student else false.

    • loginRole2

      public boolean loginRole2(User user)

      Method: boolean loginRole2(User user)

      Description: Check to see that a user with the specified username, password, and role is the same as a row in the table for the username, password, and role.

      Parameters:
      user - specifies the specific user that should be logged in playing the Reviewer role.
      Returns:
      true if the specified user has been logged in as an Student else false.

    • doesUserExist

      public boolean doesUserExist(String userName)

      Method: boolean doesUserExist(User user)

      Description: Check to see that a user with the specified username is in the table.

      Parameters:
      userName - specifies the specific user that we want to determine if it is in the table.
      Returns:
      true if the specified user is in the table else false.

    • getNumberOfRoles

      public int getNumberOfRoles(User user)

      Method: int getNumberOfRoles(User user)

      Description: Determine the number of roles a specified user plays.

      Parameters:
      user - specifies the specific user that we want to determine if it is in the table.
      Returns:
      the number of roles this user plays (0 - 5).

    • generateInvitationCode

      public String generateInvitationCode(String emailAddress, String role)

      Method: String generateInvitationCode(String emailAddress, String role)

      Description: Given an email address and a roles, this method establishes and invitation code and adds a record to the InvitationCodes table. When the invitation code is used, the stored email address is used to establish the new user and the record is removed from the table.

      Parameters:
      emailAddress - specifies the email address for this new user.
      role - specified the role that this new user will play.
      Returns:
      the code of six characters so the new user can use it to securely setup an account.

    • getNumberOfInvitations

      public int getNumberOfInvitations()

      Method: int getNumberOfInvitations()

      Description: Determine the number of outstanding invitations in the table.

      Returns:
      the number of invitations in the table.

    • emailaddressHasBeenUsed

      public boolean emailaddressHasBeenUsed(String emailAddress)

      Method: boolean emailaddressHasBeenUsed(String emailAddress)

      Description: Determine if an email address has been user to establish a user.

      Parameters:
      emailAddress - is a string that identifies a user in the table
      Returns:
      true if the email address is in the table, else return false.

    • getRoleGivenAnInvitationCode

      public String getRoleGivenAnInvitationCode(String code)

      Method: String getRoleGivenAnInvitationCode(String code)

      Description: Get the role associated with an invitation code.

      Parameters:
      code - is the 6 character String invitation code
      Returns:
      the role for the code or an empty string.

    • validateUserCodeTime

      public boolean validateUserCodeTime(String code)

      Method: bool validateUserCodeTime(String code)

      Description: Validate the user code's time stamp to check for expiration.

      Parameters:
      code - is the 6 character String invitation code
      Returns:
      whether the timestamp for the expiration has past. Expired codes will return false.

    • getEmailAddressUsingCode

      public String getEmailAddressUsingCode(String code)

      Method: String getEmailAddressUsingCode (String code )

      Description: Get the email addressed associated with an invitation code.

      Parameters:
      code - is the 6 character String invitation code
      Returns:
      the email address for the code or an empty string.

    • removeInvitationAfterUse

      public void removeInvitationAfterUse(String code)

      Method: void removeInvitationAfterUse(String code)

      Description: Remove an invitation record once it is used.

      Parameters:
      code - is the 6 character String invitation code

      public boolean updateUserRole(String username, String role, String value)

      Description: Update a specified role for a specified user's and set and update all the current user attributes.

      Parameters:
      username - is the username of the user
      role - is string that specifies the role to update
      value - is the string that specified TRUE or FALSE for the role
      Returns:
      true if the update was successful, else false
